ModelUnit.name: LintulBiomass

Input.name: cRDRNS
Input.description: max. relative death rate of leaves due to N stress

Input.name: cK
Input.description: Extinction coefficient for photosynthetically active radiation

Input.name: iPartLeavesFactor
Input.description: Proportion of daily total biomass increase partitioned to the leaves (input from LintulPartitioning.java)

Input.name: cLaiCritical
Input.description: Critical LAI beyond which leaves die due to self-shading

Input.name: cSLA
Input.description: Specific Leaf Area

Input.name: cRDRLeavesTableMeanTemperature
Input.description: Daily mean temperature for relative death rate of leaves (c.f. RDRT)

Input.name: cLaiNStressReduction
Input.description: N Stress effect on LAI growth rate

Input.name: cLAII
Input.description: Initial LAI

Input.name: nameoSow
Input.description: Flag to specify the day of sowingt

Input.name: cLueNStressReduction
Input.description: N Stress effect on LUE

Input.name: cRDRT
Input.description: Table of development specific leaves death rates

Input.name: iTRANRF
Input.description: Transpiration reduction factor (TRANRF) as ratio between actual and potential crop transpiration

Input.name: iUnusedRootBiomass
Input.description: Root Biomass which was not used by roots due to root growth limitations (is returned to biomass growth rate of the next day)

Input.name: cGrainToRootsDevStage
Input.description: DevStage after emergence up to which root biomass is supplied by the seed

Input.name: iRadiation
Input.description: Daily global radiation (input from weather file)

Input.name: cSlaNStressReduction
Input.description: N Stress effect on Specific Leaf Area

Input.name: iAirTemperatureMean
Input.description: Measured daily average air temperature (input calculated from weather file)

Input.name: iEffectiveTempRateAfterAnt
Input.description: Daily effective temperature after anthesis

Input.name: cRDRL
Input.description: max. rel. death rate of leaves due to water stress

Input.name: cDevStageRGRL
Input.description: Development stage of the crop up to which the growth rate of LAI is calculated based on the constant, user defined rate RGRL

Input.name: iNitrogenNutritionIndex
Input.description: Nitrogen Nutrition Index is the ratio between actual crop N concentration and critical N concentration (half of optimum N concentration which depends on crop and development stage)

Input.name: cRDRLeavesTableRelativeRate
Input.description: Relative death rate of leaves as a function of daily mean temperature (c.f. RDRT)

Input.name: iPartStemsFactor
Input.description: Proportion of daily total biomass increase partitioned to the stem (input from LintulPartitioning.java)

Input.name: idevStage
Input.description: Development stage of the plant (1.0=anthesis, 2.0=physiological maturity

Input.name: iCropAvailWaterContent
Input.description: Crop available water content in the soil

Input.name: cRDRSHM
Input.description: Maximum relative death rate of leaves due to shading

Input.name: iPartStorageOrgansFactor
Input.description: Proportion of daily total biomass increase partitioned to the storage organs (input from LintulPartitioning.java)

Input.name: cGrainToRootsDailyBiomass
Input.description: Daily biomass, that is supplied from the seeds to the roots after emergency

Input.name: iPartRootFactor
Input.description: Proportion of daily total biomass increase partitioned to the roots (input from LintulPartitioning.java)

Input.name: idoHarvest
Input.description: Flag to specify the day of harvest

Input.name: cRelativeDayOfEmergence
Input.description: Days between sowing and start of LAI development/plant growth

Input.name: iLeaveSenescenceHeatStressFactor
Input.description: Factor that increases leaf senescence due to heat stress

Input.name: iLUE
Input.description: Light Use Efficiency

Input.name: iEffectiveTempRateBeforeAnt
Input.description: Daily effective temperature before anthesis

Input.name: cRGRL
Input.description: Relative growth rate of LAI during exponential growth

Output.name: rDLAI
Output.description: Rate of change of Leaf area index

Output.name: AboveGroundBiomass
Output.description: Sum of Biomass fractions above ground

Output.name: GTOTAL
Output.description: Growth rate of total crop dry matter

Output.name: rRWLVG
Output.description: Rate of change in weight of green leaves

Output.name: rRWRT
Output.description: Rate of change in weight of roots
